25#ifndef ARCHIVE_OPENSSL_EVP_PRIVATE_H_INCLUDED
26#define ARCHIVE_OPENSSL_EVP_PRIVATE_H_INCLUDED
27
28#include <openssl/evp.h>
29#include <openssl/opensslv.h>
30
31#if OPENSSL_VERSION_NUMBER < 0x10100000L
32#include <stdlib.h> /* malloc, free */
33#include <string.h> /* memset */
34static inline EVP_MD_CTX *EVP_MD_CTX_new(void)
35{
36 EVP_MD_CTX *ctx = (EVP_MD_CTX *)calloc(1, sizeof(EVP_MD_CTX));
37 return ctx;
38}
39
40static inline void EVP_MD_CTX_free(EVP_MD_CTX *ctx)
41{
42 EVP_MD_CTX_cleanup(ctx);
43 memset(ctx, 0, sizeof(*ctx));
44 free(ctx);
45}
46#endif
47
48#endif
49
